Parameters.Name: RECORDING-3-1-5 RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-3-1-5 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct Response. Annex A.5: MediaProfile not found
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt The first VSC has VECs There is VEC with required codec in GetCompatibleVEC response Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response with fault on CreateRecordingJobRequest (Action/MaxRecordingJobs)
Test.Description: The DUT send soap fault on CreateRecordingJobRequest (Action/MaxRecordingJobs)

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. No GetRecordingJobState Response
Test.Description: The DUT did not send valid GetRecordingJobStateResponse message. No response.

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong Job State for job001.
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong Job State for job001

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong Job State for job002.
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong Job State for job002

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong Job State for job001 after priority changing.
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong Job State for job001 after deleting job002

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong media profile token in Job configuration for job001
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong media profile token in Job configuration for job001

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong media profile token in Job configuration for job002
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong media profile token in Job configuration for job002

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong recording token in Job configuration for job001 - 1
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong recording token in Job configuration for job001

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. Wrong recording token in Job configuration for job001 - 2
Test.Description:
Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True
Wrong recording token in Job configuration for job001

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect Response. Annex A.5: Profile with encoding from the Capabilities.Encoding list was not created
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is not created

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect Response. Annex A.5: VEC changing was not applied
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is not found Profile is created at first attempt The first VSC has VECs There is no VEC with required codec in GetCompatibleVEC response

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response. A.6: DynamicRecordings is False
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecordings is False

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. A.10: Invalid DeleteRecordingResponse and SetRecordingConfigurationResponse messages
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can not be created Invalid DeleteRecordingResponse message Annex A.6: Invalid SetRecordingConfigurationResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response with existing RecordingJob
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingOptionsResponse
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Fault on GetRecordingOptionsResponse

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: No response on GetRecordingOptions
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True No response on GetRecordingOptions

Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True No response on CreateRecordingJob

Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingJobsResponse

Test.Name: Fault on GetRecordingJobStateResponse
Test.Description: The DUT sends fault GetRecordingJobStateResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Fault on DeleteRecordingJobResponse 1
Test.Description: Annex A.5: Profile is found Annex A.10: New recording can be created Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Fault on DeleteRecordingJobResponse (job002)
